body: "everyone is his grandkid or great-grandkid". theres a flaw in the logic tho. if mc's just the grandkid and not great-grandkid and most of the women are older than him, that estimate is a generation too far. they are just his aunts, with the occasional first cousins.

This one is really something, so in the end, his grandpa really cut ties with his family and even take his wife's name for his own huh ? haha it's all worth it I think XD

Now This is a story all about how 

 my life got flipped turned upside down 

 and I'd like to take a minute to tell you bluntly

 How I became the H-Prince in this mountain country


 Some city in Japan born and raised

 Thought it'd be there I'd spend the rest of my days

 Chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool

 I was a good kid not breakin' any rules

 Then in the spring of my fifteenth year

 My dad had to move overseas to up his career

 I was set on Staying so my mom declared

 She said "you movin' in with your granpa in that fresh mountain air"
